document_data.name: Ormn
document_data.mainbody:
'''Ormn''' was a [[bear]] that dwelled at the [[Emerald Grove]] along with his master, [[Archdruid]] [[Halsin]].

{{Quote|May your hibernations be long and calm.|Ormn, as understood by those with [[speak with animals|magical means]].}}
document_data.Personality: He had the bear form of low self-esteem and did not view himself as particularly strong.
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Halsin departed the Emerald Grove for the nearby [[Shattered Sanctum]] to investigate a strange happenings at [[Moonrise Towers]] that saw the implanting of [[mind flayer]] tadpoles into the eyes of [[humanoid]] creatures and their conversion to the mysterious [[Cult of the Absolute]]. 

Ormn was despondent over his master's departure. He spent all his time catching fish at a small stretch of beach near the grove, unable to pick up Halsin's scent despite the return of those belonging to his traveling companions.
